Peringkat Mudah Berusaha RI Mentok, Pengusaha: Izin di Daerah Ribet
02 Nov 2019, 04:50 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Tim Infografis: Mindra Purnomo

Jakarta - Peringkat kemudahan berusaha atau (ease of doing business/EODB) Indonesia stagnan atau mentok di peringkat 73. Berdasarkan laporan Bank Dunia (World Bank) peringkat kemudahan berusaha tanah air sama seperti tahun 2019.Ketua Umum Kamar Dagang dan Industri (Kadin) Indonesia, Rosan Roeslani mengatakan proses kemudahan berusaha masih banyak terganjal di daerah. Sehingga proses pengurusan investasi di daerah masih ribet."Iya betul, itu karena kalau kita mengundang investor kan kita kasih tahu persyaratannya begini. Nah, tapi kadang-kadang ada kebijakan di daerah yang justru kurang kondusif," kata Rosan saat dihubungi detikcom, Jakarta, Sabtu (3/11/2019).Rosan menyebut, proses perizinan antara pusat dan daerah juga belum harmonis. Pengusaha merasa proses berusaha di pusat sudah lebih cepat namun begitu masuk ke ranah daerah prosesnya semakin panjang dan lama.Sebagai pengusaha, Rosan juga sering mendapat keluhan dari para pelaku usaha baik yang sudah menanamkan uangnya di tanah air maupun yang baru memulai."Jadi kebijakannya untuk investasi permit atau izin pusat hanya 5 begitu sampai daerahnya bisa menjadi 20," jelas dia."Jadi itu juga yang harus diperbaiki, jadi mesti ada harmonisasi kebijakan antara Pemerintah pusat dan daerah, itu yang paling banyak dikeluhkan oleh investor yang sudah menanamkan duit di sini maupun yang baru akan mulai," tambah dia.Dia pun berharap ke depannya Pemerintah Daerah bisa menyerahkan otoritas yang mengurusi investasi masuk ke dalam sistem online single submission (OSS) yang sudah dioperasikan Pemerintah pusat dalam memperlancar proses berusaha atau investasi di Indonesia."Iya betul, ya terutama yang di daerah, tapi paling penting adalah kepastian hukum atau enforcing the contract, itu yang disoroti oleh EoDB, kita masih sangat kurang, dan juga starting the business itu juga yang perlu kita perbaiki. Jadi masih ada beberapa hal lagi, kita perbaiki dan permudah bisa kok, sangat-sangat bisa," ungkap dia.Simak Video "Dapat Tugas Tambahan Urus Investasi, Luhut: Ya Terima Saja"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/eds)

RI's Easy Attempts Rating Mentok, Entrepreneurs: Permits in Ribet Areas
02 Nov 2019, 04:50 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Infographic Team: Mindra Purnomo

Jakarta - Indonesia's ease of doing business (EODB) rating is stagnant or stuck at rank 73. Based on World Bank reports, the ranking of business ease in Indonesia is the same as in 2019. The General Chairperson of the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (Kadin) Rosan Roeslani said that the process of ease of doing business was still hampered in many regions. So the investment management process in the regions is still complicated. "Yes, that's right, because if we invite investors, we will inform the requirements like this. Now, but sometimes there are policies in the regions that are actually less conducive," Rosan said when contacted by AFP, Jakarta, Saturday (3/11/2019). Rosan said, the licensing process between the center and the regions was also not harmonious. Entrepreneurs feel the process of trying at the center is faster but once entered into the realm of the area the process is getting longer and longer. As a businessman, Rosan also often gets complaints from business people both who have invested their money in the homeland and who are just starting. "So the policy is to investment permit or central permit is only 5 so that the area can be 20, "he explained." So that also needs to be improved, so there must be a harmonization of policies between the central and regional governments, that is the most complained by investors who have invested money here. and the new one will start, "he added. He also hopes that in the future the Regional Government can hand over the authority in charge of investment into the online single submission system (OSS) that has been operated by the central government in expediting the business or investment process in Indonesia." Yes, that's right Yes, especially in the regions, but the most important thing is legal certainty or enforcing the contract, that was highlighted by EoDB, we are still very lacking, and also the starting the business is also what we need to improve. So there are still a few more things, we can fix it and make it really easy, really, really can, "he said.
